Parameter.Label: Enable/Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

Item.Label: Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.
Enable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

Parameter.Label: Timeout of the motion sensor (in seconds)
Parameter.Help: How long should the device associated to MultiSensor keep state On before sending it Off command (if the value is bigger than 255, the value would be rounded to next integer in minutes, else seconds)

Parameter.Label: Enable/disable the function of motion sensor.

Item.Label: Disable the function of motion sensor.
Enable the function of motion sensor.

Parameter.Label: Which command would be sent when the motion sensor triggered.
PIR sensitivity configuration
Parameter.Help: The range of PIR Sensitivity is 0 to 127.

Parameter.Label: Low battery value configuration.
Parameter.Help: The range of low battery value is 10% to 50%.

Parameter.Label: Enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage set in 41-44 below.
Parameter.help: This is used to reduce network traffic. (0 == disable, 1 == enable)

Parameter.Label: Threshold of temperature.
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. When the unit is Celsius, threshold=Value. When the unit is Fahrenheit, threshold=Value*1.8. The accuracy is 0.1. The high byte is the part of integer, the low byte is the fractional part.

Parameter.Label: Threshold of humidity.
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report.

Parameter.Label: Threshold of luminance.
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.

Parameter.Label: Threshold of battery level.
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report.

Parameter.Label: Threshold of ultraviolet.
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in ultraviolet to induce an automatic report.

Parameter.Label: Enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature

Item.Label: Disable to send the alarm report of low temperature less than -15 degrees C)
Enable to send the alarm report of low temperature less than -15 degrees C)

Parameter.Label: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for Group 1
Parameter.Help: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual sensors and battery. The sensors have the values: Battery=1, Ultraviolet=16, Temperature=32, Humidity=64, Light=128 Therefore if you want all sensors and the battery sending regular reports, set the parameter to 241 (1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128 ).

Parameter.Label: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for Group 2
Parameter.Help: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual sensors and battery. The sensors have the values: Battery=1, Ultraviolet=16, Temperature=32, Humidity=64, Light=128 Therefore if you want all sensors and the battery sending regular reports, set the parameter to 241 (1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128 ).

Parameter.Label: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for Group 3
Parameter.Help: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual sensors and battery. The sensors have the values: Battery=1, Ultraviolet=16, Temperature=32, Humidity=64, Light=128 Therefore if you want all sensors and the battery sending regular reports, set the parameter to 241 (1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128 ).

Parameter.Label: Interval to send out reports of Group 1
Interval to send out reports of Group 2
Interval to send out reports of Group 3
Temperature calibration.
Parameter.help: The range of calibration value is -32768 to 32767.

Parameter.Label: Humidity sensor calibration.
Parameter.help: The range of calibration value is -32768 to 32767.

Parameter.Label: Luminance sensor calibration.
Parameter.help: The range of calibration value is -32768 to 32767.

Parameter.Label: Ultraviolet sensor calibration.
Parameter.help: The range of calibration value is -11 to 11.

Parameter.Label: Enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked

Item.Label: Disable all configuration parameters to be locked.
Enable all configuration parameters to be locked.

Parameter.Label: Reset to default factory settings.

Item.Label: Resets all configuration parameters to default setting.
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.

Group.Label: Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate. The Motion sensor, Humidity sensor, thermometer, light sensor and Ultraviolet sensor reports will be sent to the associated nodes in Group 1.
